summary: We follow several kids with families with a dream of their offspring becoming a TV- or movie star, who for three months live in an apartment complex, where the management host a variety of events and trains them towards such a career.
cast: Andrew Manley|Rosie Forti|Toni Casala|John McCarthy|Lynne Murphy Badgley|Paul Petersen|Carol Nicholson|Angie Peiris|Heather Broeker|Alyssa Casa|Christopher Casa|Patrick Casa|Ryan Casa|Wendi Casa|Presley Cash|Corey Feldman|Shanna Grace|Sandra Haun|D'Kristian Lamar|Lisa Lax|Elise Luthman|Joey Luthman|Ashley McGullam|Savannah McReynolds|Pixie Monroe|Lauren Dair Owens|Micah Tayloe Owens|Steven Christopher Parker|Alyssa Petersen|Amanda Petersen|Jake Radaker|Saige Ryan
title: The Hollywood Complex
